The article claiming that Trudeau bought: The website that spread the article, conservativemovement.ca, acknowledged that all articles on their website are fictitious.
The prime minister: s office confirmed that the story was not true, further verifying the claim's inauthenticity.
A search on Trudeau: s Twitter account for the quote attributed to him defending the purchase as a business expense yielded no results. The only results associated with the quote were from the Fried.news article, indicating that the claim was not supported by any evidence.
The website that made the article go vir: conservativemovement.ca, was created by Ontario-based artist Ray Liyaga. Liyaga declined to comment when contacted by AFP, suggesting a lack of credibility and transparency in the source of the claim.
